summary: Dedicated technology professional with a rich and diverse background spanning over two decades, offering a unique blend of technical expertise, leadership, and innovation. A proven track record of translating complex business demands into tangible technology solutions and driving forward-thinking initiatives across various industries.

authors.headline: Innovative Technology Leader ★ Business Technology Translator ★ Expert in Software Engineering and Scientific Computing ★ Published Researcher ★ Speaker

profile_positions.description: Constantly on cutting-edge of technology, translating complex business demands into technology prototypes. Supporting various innovation projects by mentoring, inspiring and leading.
profile_positions.title: Technology Innovation Lead / Tech Trends Analysis Practice Lead

profile_positions.description:
The technical referent on a field of software engineering, AI (artificial intelligence) technologies and scientific computing. Technical lead of the Innovation Group of Scientific Computing (IGSC) at Altran.
Realising and supporting the high value projects, and delivering the high value software solutions to the clients. Advising on technology and innovation developments. Contributing to the decision making about solutions. Offering the roadmaps.
profile_positions.title: Adv. Expert / Technical lead of IGSC

profile_positions.description: Consultancy in the field of scientific computing and software engineering that focuses on technological innovation.
profile_positions.title: Adv. Consultant & Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Performing the architecture quality assessment of several applications written in Fortran. Responsible for understanding of the business aspects of those applications and the issues related to their usage.
Consulting on the short-/long-term solutions bringing stability and robustness to the applications.

Keywords: FORTRAN77, fortran90/95, META-Fortran, C, Digital Command Language (DCL), Software Architecture, OpenVMS
profile_positions.title: Software Architect Technical Lead (via Altran)

profile_positions.description:
Leading the team towards the launch of Europe's first public quantum computing platform: 'Quantum Inspire'. The QI SW team is responsible for the development of the full stack between the web GUI and all the way to the quantum hardware chip (2-qubit semiconductor electron spin processor, 5-qubit supercomductor Transmon processor).

Keywords: SDK, Low-level API, QASM, LibKet, cQASM, ProjectQ, Qiskit, Grover's algorithm, Qubit measurements, Scrum/Agile, Python, C++, DevOps, CI/CD, Gitlab
profile_positions.title: Product Owner / Team Lead / Senior Consultant (via Altran)

profile_positions.description:
Participation in all aspects of the software development life cycle of the SKF SimPro™ Expert application.
Scrum Master of SSE team (about 10 people).
Consulting in the area of AI and machine learning with the goal of the simulation software package SimPro Expert improvement.

Keywords: Scrum/Agile, C++, Qt, Simulation software, Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer / Consultant (via Altran)

profile_positions.description:
Designing, developing and implementing the MFrac Suite (a single-well simulator capable of modelling the effects of hydraulic fracturing treatments), consisting of a range of standalone, thick-client applications with rich user interfaces, 2D plots and 3D visualisation.

Keywords: Scrum/Agile, C++, Windows COM, Python, Visualisation, MFrac, hydraulic fracturing
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer / Consultant (via Altran)

profile_positions.description:
Designing and implementing the new functionalities of the SPYRO® (the steam cracking simulation standard) and its parallel version.

Keywords: Modern Fortran, C++, Python, Matlab, Microsoft COM, Spyro
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer (via Altran)

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy in the field of scientific computing and software engineering by means of developing software and implementing algorithms. Analyzing the overall architecture and detailed design of available code in order to identify optimization opportunities for the use of resources.

Keywords: C++, C, Python, Fortran, Matlab, OpenMP, MPI
profile_positions.title: Technical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Taking part in all aspects of the software development life cycle to design and implement the new, improved functionalities for the next generation lithography product chip machines.

Achievements
● One of the implemented functionalities has acquired the inner company patent.
● All software solutions are delivered as cost-effective design solutions while keeping within budgetary constraints.

Keywords: Agile/Scrum, SOLID, Design Patterns, TDD, Unit Testing, BDD, Testbench development, C/C++, Python, XML
profile_positions.title: Software Design Engineer Metrology

profile_positions.description:
Expanding and maintaining the scientific software package FORM by implementing new/improved functionalities (C, OpenMP) by means of software engineering.

Achievements
● The new feature - polynomial factorization (the bracket system) - is added to the symbolic system FORM. It allows the fast sorting of millions of terms inside any mathematical expression.
profile_positions.title: Scientific Engineer
